name: 02-Checking-Seasonality-and-Trends
parameters: --var getStarted=true --var EDAStore='Curtain Wall' --var EDAItem='Curtain Wall 36','Curtain Wall 50','Curtain Wall 60','Curtain Wall 61.5','Vortex 70' --var execute=true

nodes.name: Read CSV
nodes.description: It reads in CSV files and creates a DataFrame from it.
nodes.hint: Infer the schema when a new file is selected or the file content has changed

fields.title: Output Storage Level

fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.name: storageLevel

fields.name: description
fields.value:
- Seasonality represents the regular and predictable fluctuations in the sales data that occur at specific intervals, such as months or seasons.
- It is calculated by analyzing the recurring patterns in sales data over these intervals. The seasonality value indicates the strength and direction of these recurring patterns.
- The seasonal graph reveals recurring patterns at regular intervals (seasonal) or longer-term fluctuations (cyclic).
fields.title: Description

fields.name: maxValuesToDisplay
fields.title: Max Values To Display
fields.description: Maximum number of values to display in result.

fields.name: isStreaming
fields.title: Is Streaming?
fields.description: Whether the Graph is a Streaming Graph or not

fields.name: xSortCol
fields.title: Sort on X Column?
fields.description: Whether to Sort on X column or not

fields.name: description
fields.value:
- The trend value represents the overall direction of change in the sales data over time. It shows whether the sales are generally increasing, decreasing, or staying relatively constant over a longer period.
- It is calculated by analyzing the pattern and relationship within the sales data series, often using statistical techniques like linear regression to fit a line to the data points.
- The graph is upward, which means that over time, there is a consistent increase in the values of sales being observed.
fields.title: Description
